attributes.additional_details:
The People have had enough of Politicians looking after themselves rather than getting together and actioning the referendum result to leave the EU.

The Brexit debates over the last two years have been nothing more than the 'Remainers' trying to reverse the result rather that get on with what the People voted for.

It is now time they were all removed from their elite positions, Local Elections held then quickly followed by a National Election.

Let the People show these so called 'representatives' just what we think of them.
attributes.background: Because of the terrible behaviour of our Politicians relating to Brexit and their obvious 'looking after number one' attitude, all sitting MP's should be ejected from their job and Local Elections held then followed by a National Election.
